articles.title: PGD Eco Solutions, Inc. Announces Strategic Pivot to Become a SaaS-Based AI Technology Company  May. 19, 2025 23:44
articles.summary: PGD Eco Solutions Inc. is transitioning into a SaaS AI technology company and launching its first AI SaaS platform. The company focuses on scaling next-generation AI-driven SaaS solutions. The initial technologies developed have entered beta testing and will be finalizing beta testing and proceeding to a full product launch in the coming months

articles.title: What Tesla CEO Elon Musk announced at Microsoft Build 2025 while chatting with CEO Satya Nadella
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Microsoft is expanding its Azure AI Foundry model offerings to include Grok 3 and Grok 3 mini from xAI. The Grok AI models will be hosted and billed directly by Microsoft, making them available to its own product teams and enterprise clients through the Azure AI Foundry service. The Grok 3 and Grok 3 mini models available through Azure AI Foundry are expected to be more controlled than their counterparts on X with enhanced data integration, customization options, and governance capabilities.

articles.title: An opening date has been set for Bellingham's second Trader Joe's market
articles.author: Alyse Smith
articles.summary: Trader Joe's is opening its second Bellingham location on May 29th. The new 9,831-square-foot store, located at 4255 Meridian St., will host a ribbon-cutting ceremony at 8 a.m. and aims to provide a Pacific Northwest-themed grocery experience while supporting the local community through its Neighborhood Shares Program.

articles.title: Bond or Batman? Why the Galaxy S25 Edge is a phone for cool characters
articles.author: Andy Boxall
articles.summary: Samsung has announced the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim and light flagship smartphone targeted towards users who want to make a statement. The company is focusing on lightness, slimness, and advanced technology in this device and is researching the target audience for this phone.

articles.title: Tesco launches wedding gift registry as couples ditch fine china for toilet roll and bin bags
articles.author: Angharad Carrick
articles.summary: Tesco has launched a wedding gift registry service in partnership with Prezola, offering couples curated bundles of everyday essentials and Tesco Finest products. These bundles, designed with input from Married At First Sight expert Mel Shilling, range from basic necessities to luxury items like champagne, providing practical support for newlyweds.

articles.title: The Microsoft Store eliminates publishing fees for Windows apps
articles.author: Mark Hachman
articles.summary: Microsoft will waive the fee to sign up and publish to the Microsoft Store starting in June. This initiative aims to attract more Windows app developers by making the Microsoft Store on Windows the first "free" store for publishing apps. Individual developers can publish to the Store for free starting June.

articles.title: 12 Best Keratin Shampoos & Conditioner, According to Hairstylists
articles.summary: The article introduces and reviews several keratin shampoos, including Chi Keratin Silk Infusion Shampoo, OGX Frizz-Free Keratin Oil Shampoo, and Ouai Fine Hair Shampoo. These shampoos cater to diverse hair needs such as frizz control, fine hair volume, and overall hair strengthening, featuring ingredients like hydrolyzed keratin, argan oil, and biotin.

articles.title: Sprite launches a new limited-edition flavor! What's it and when will it be released?
articles.author: Bibiana Palacios
articles.summary: Coca-Cola brand Sprite launched Sprite + Tea, a new limited-edition flavor combining lemon-lime with iced tea notes. The new flavor is available in retail stores nationwide in regular and sugar-free versions and will be sold through October.

articles.title: I tested the Ninja slushi and created ‘one of the best drinks I've ever made'
articles.author: Alex Aitcheson-David
articles.summary: The Ninja slushi machine uses a condenser and auger to cool and mix ingredients, creating slushies from various beverages like Coca-Cola, juices, milkshakes, and cocktails. It can handle different ingredients but requires sufficient sugar content for proper slush formation. The machine is priced at £349.

articles.title: Woman Using Acrylic Glass Phone In Viral TikTok Sparks Confusion. Here's The TRUTH
articles.author: Saihaj Madan
articles.summary: A user named Cat showcased a 'methaphone,' a clear acrylic object shaped like a smartphone designed by her friend, aiming to test if it could curb phone addiction by replacing the feeling of holding a phone. This new product, already sold out, serves as a social experiment to explore phone addiction and user responses are mixed.

articles.title: New Zaxbys opens in Bristol
articles.author: Allison Winters
articles.summary: Zaxby's celebrated the grand opening of a new restaurant location in Bristol, Tennessee, last week. This marks the launch of a new Zaxby's service point.

articles.title: Microsoft wants to turn websites into AI apps with new project
articles.summary: Microsoft introduced Natural Language Web (NLWeb) at Build 2025. NLWeb is an open project designed to enable websites to become AI applications. It allows users to query sites using natural language, resembling an AI assistant or Copilot.

articles.title: Blank Beauty: $6 Million Series A Raised For Personalized Beauty Platform
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Blank Beauty secured $6 million in Series A funding to accelerate its market presence and expand its customizable product offerings. The company's proprietary robotic color production platform includes Huey, an AI-powered in-store robotic platform for custom nail polish, and Dolly, an automated fulfillment system. The company plans to expand its offering to include custom formulations in skin tone products and hair care.

articles.title: Get a New Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge for $170 Off With This Memorial Day Deal
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Samsung's new Galaxy S25 Edge, a thin smartphone, is set to release on May 30 with a retail price of $1,270. Amazon and Samsung are offering a $170 discount, while Amazon also includes a $50 gift card for pre-orders. The device is available in Titanium Jetblack, Titanium Silver, and Titanium Icyblue.

articles.title: Overwatch 2's Street Fighter Skins Are A Knockout
articles.author: Kotaku
articles.summary: Blizzard has unveiled new skins for Overwatch 2 following the crossover event announcement. These skins represent new product offerings from Blizzard within the Overwatch 2 game.

articles.title: 'I recreated Starbucks' viral pistachio iced latte at home for under £1'
articles.summary: Starbucks launched a new pistachio latte and iced latte earlier this year. Nespresso introduced limited-edition Pistachio Vanilla Flavour Over Ice original and Vertuo pods.

articles.title: The curious case of the missing Alexa+ users – many are still waiting for 'early access'
articles.author: Eric Hal Schwartz
articles.summary: Amazon is launching Alexa+, an AI-infused version of the Alexa voice assistant, designed to be smarter, more useful, and better at personalized conversations. Early access invites are being rolled out to customers, but concerns exist regarding the speed, accuracy, and cost of running the new AI models, potentially impacting Amazon's smart home strategy.

articles.title: Plus Manufacturing Inc. Celebrates Continued Green Seal Certification Excellence for Soap Free Procyon Extreme Pre-Spray
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: Procyon Plus Manufacturing, Inc. has announced the continued Green Seal® Certification of its Soap Free Procyon Extreme Pre-Spray.

articles.title: Shopper visits Primark and is left 'crying' over one thing
articles.summary: Primark introduced a new duvet bedding set for £18, which is a dupe of the Djerf Avenue designer brand bedding costing £120. The new Primark bedding pack includes a duvet cover and a fitted sheet featuring a fruit print.

articles.title: Aldi has restocked it's viral beer pump that recreates the pub experience at home just in time for Father's Day
articles.author: Claudia Jackson
articles.summary: Aldi is launching several new products targeting Father's Day gifts. These include the Beer Dispenser priced at £24.99, the Drew & Cole Sandwich Maker also at £24.99, and a Dartboard for £17.99. Additionally, Aldi is offering Character Short Pyjamas for £8.99 and Men's Slippers for £4.99, and a discounted Prosecco for £4.99.

articles.title: Aldi has restocked it's viral beer pump that recreates the pub experience at home just in time for Father's Day
articles.author: Claudia Jackson
articles.summary: Aldi is launching several products and special offers for Father's Day. These include the Beer Dispenser, Drew & Cole Sandwich Maker, Dartboard, Character Short Pyjamas, and Men's Slippers. Furthermore, Aldi has reduced the price of its Prosecco to £4.99 a bottle for a limited time.

articles.title: Aldi has restocked it's viral beer pump that recreates the pub experience at home just in time for Father's Day
articles.author: Claudia Jackson
articles.summary: Aldi has restocked its Beer Dispenser for £24.99 and introduced the new Drew & Cole Sandwich Maker for £24.99. The Beer Dispenser transforms canned beer into a draught experience. The Sandwich Maker creates hot muffin-style sandwiches.

articles.title: Stanley secretly dropped a new water bottle — and it's already starting to sell out
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: Stanley has launched a new product called the Next x Nature Canteen, a 25-ounce capacity drinkware, priced at $45 and available in three colors. Made of recycled stainless steel, it features a lightweight design, a larger mouth for easy filling, a twist-off lid, and an adjustable strap.

articles.title: Madrí Excepcional lager beer, launched with impact in retail, by Bergenbier SA and the Mediascope agency
articles.author: Simona Hrincescu
articles.summary: Bergenbier S.A. is launching Madrí Excepcional, an urban lager beer, in Romania with marketing and retail implementation by Mediascope. Mediascope is creating immersive 'Corner Screens' to support the launch, integrating digital technology and traditional promotional elements to create a deep connection between the brand and the consumer, delivering an immersive brand experience in retail.

articles.title: Driving impressions: unveiling the fourth-generation Suzuki Dzire
articles.author: Independent online
articles.summary: Suzuki South Africa launched the fourth-generation Dzire. This launch adds to Suzuki's portfolio, which has contributed to strong sales performance in South Africa.

articles.title: Unilever Invests 80 Million Pounds in Fragrance Research, Development in the U.K.
articles.author: Samantha Conti
articles.summary: Unilever is investing 80 million pounds in a state-of-the-art fragrance research and development facility in Port Sunlight, England. The facility will develop fragrances for Unilever's everyday products like shampoos, moisturizers, and laundry detergents. This facility will also include robotics and AI to drive fragrance development.

articles.title: Meta Will Soon Enable Advertisers to Test Experimental AI Features
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Meta is developing the 'Early Release' program, allowing select advertisers early access to experimental AI ad features. This initiative focuses on testing creative AI ad tools like video generation from prompts for Facebook, Instagram, and Threads ads. Participating advertisers can preview and customize these features before opting in.

articles.title: Month Uniposto Mobile Deal – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Mobile operators are offering new deals on the iPhone 16. These deals combine the phone with a fully-loaded mobile plan for one affordable monthly price, making premium technology accessible. Consumers can upgrade to the iPhone 16 without a huge upfront investment through these offers.

articles.title: Mowi Launches New Atlantic Salmon Product at the 2025 National Restaurant Association Show
articles.summary: Mowi launched its new salmon product, 'MOWI Signature,' at the 2025 National Restaurant Association Show in Chicago. This product line offers 4-8 kg packages of fresh, premium salmon sourced from Mowi's farms in Norway and Scotland and tailored for professional kitchens. MOWI Signature salmon is fresh, never frozen, and fully prepared for convenient use.

articles.title: Dyson's £125 vacuum shoppers say is 'streets ahead of other models'
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Dyson's V6 vacuum cleaner, originally released in 2014, is now available refurbished for £125 via Wowcher. The Dyson V6 has up to 200W suction power, HEPA filter and is lightweight (2.04kg). Alternatively, SMOTURE currently has a new vacuum model on sale for £159.99 at Amazon. Shark also has its own cordless model with Anti Hair Wrap technology that's on sale for £189.99 from £279.99 at Amazon.

articles.title: Went hands-on with Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge, and it's the haute couture of phones
articles.author: Abhinav Kaustubh
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, an ultra-thin and lightweight phone featuring a 6.7-inch display and powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite for Galaxy chipset. The S25 Edge includes a 200MP main camera, 12GB of RAM, and a 3,900mAh battery, with a price of Rs 109,999.

articles.title: Microsoft will host Elon Musk's Grok in its cloud
articles.author: Ina Fried
articles.summary: Microsoft is adding xAI's Grok AI model to its cloud service. Microsoft also announced a new GitHub coding agent that can work independently on multiple tasks and NLWeb, an open project designed to simplify the creation of natural language interfaces for websites.

articles.title: NLWeb is Microsoft's project to bring more chatbots to webpages
articles.author: Kyle Wiggers
articles.summary: Microsoft is launching NLWeb, an open-source project designed to simplify the creation of AI-powered chatbots for websites. Announced at Build 2025, NLWeb allows websites to offer conversational interfaces using a few lines of code, an AI model, and their data, potentially enabling retailers and cooking sites to create bots for various purposes.

articles.title: Microsoft's plan to fix the web: letting every website run AI search for cheap
articles.author: David Pierce
articles.summary: Microsoft introduced NLWeb, an open protocol designed to enable website and app owners to easily incorporate ChatGPT-style interaction features. This protocol allows developers to create custom chatbots with a few lines of code, using their choice of AI model and data. Companies like TripAdvisor, Eventbrite, and Shopify are collaborating with Microsoft to integrate natural interaction into their platforms using NLWeb.

articles.title: Myntra enters Singapore, eyes 6.5 lakh Indian diaspora
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: Myntra launched Myntra Global, a new service, in Singapore to target the 6.5 lakh Indian diaspora. Myntra Global will use third-party logistics to deliver orders in 4-7 days.

articles.title: New City, New Vibes: Say Hello to the itel City 100The Bold New Smartphone Made for the Young and Vibrant
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: itel has launched the itel City 100, the first device from its new City Series smartphone line. This phone is designed for young, bold, and vibrant users.

articles.title: PGD Eco Solutions, Inc. Announces Strategic Pivot to Become a SaaS-Based AI Technology Company
articles.author: PGD Eco Solutions
articles.summary: PGD Eco Solutions Inc. is transitioning into a SaaS AI technology company and has soft-launched its first SaaS platform. They are scaling next-generation AI-driven SaaS solutions and plan a public rollout of their internally developed AI SaaS platform in the coming months, following successful beta testing. The company is also updating its investor presentation and website to reflect this new direction.

articles.title: Best Lobster Rolls in Los Angeles – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Luke's Lobster offers a classic New England-style lobster roll. The Lonely Oyster is known for its adventurous flavor combinations and unique twists on lobster rolls. Found Oyster offers a creamy lobster bisque lobster roll.

articles.title: No Apps, No Notifications: US Startup's 'Fake' Phones Spark Buzz Online
articles.author: Ritu Singh
articles.summary: Methaphone, a startup, launched a new product called "Methaphone" in the US market. This fake phone, priced at $20, mimics the shape and weight of a real smartphone, allowing users to simulate scrolling motions without accessing digital content, aiming to combat phone addiction.

articles.title: Where are the users of Alexa+?
articles.author: Greg Bensinger
articles.summary: Amazon launched Alexa+, a new GenAI-powered voice assistant, aiming to revitalize the decade-old Alexa service. The company showcased Alexa+'s capabilities at a press event and initiated invite access for customers in late March. As of May, Amazon reported approximately 100,000 users having access to Alexa+.

articles.title: OnePlus 13s key features revealed ahead of June 5 launch in India
articles.author: MD Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus 13s smartphone in India on June 5th. It features Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, advanced cooling system, upgraded antenna system, and G1 Wi-Fi chipset for stable connections in India. The device includes a new Plus key for quick access to sound profiles and AI tools.

articles.title: LAST CHANCE: Visit Olipop's virtual drive-thru today for mocktails, DIY summer drinks
articles.author: David Hoffman
articles.summary: Olipop is hosting a virtual drive-thru event to promote their newest Orange Cream flavor and offer a chance to win a mocktail kit or a 12-pack of the new flavor. The company is also offering a 20% discount on all purchases made with the coupon code DRIVETHRU20.

articles.title: Shopper urges Primark fans to 'run' to get hands on £18 bedding that left her 'crying'
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: Primark has introduced a new bedding set, a 'Djerf Avenue dupe', priced at £18. The bedding pack includes a duvet cover and a fitted sheet and is made from a blend of polyester and a minimum of 50% cotton from the Primark sustainable cotton programme. It features a fruit print design.

articles.title: Shopper urges Primark fans to 'run' to buy £18 bedding that left her 'crying'
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: Primark has introduced a new bedding set as a dupe of Djerf Avenue, priced at £18. This bedding set includes a duvet cover and a fitted sheet with a fruit print design. The material is a blend of polyester and a minimum of 50% cotton from the Primark sustainable cotton programme.

articles.title: The Dyson V8 Origin Cordless Vacuum Is At A Deep Discount At Target — But You'll Have To Hurry
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: The Dyson V8 Origin cordless vacuum is currently on sale at Target for $299.99, a 30% discount from its usual retail price.  This lightweight and versatile vacuum features strong suction, a washable filter, and can transform into a handheld vacuum.  It also comes with multiple cleaning tools and a docking station.

articles.title: From beer to milk: Asahi ventures into dairy alternatives with Like Milk
articles.author: Teodora Lyubomirova
articles.summary: Asahi Group has launched 'Like Milk,' a yeast-based milk alternative, in Japan on a trial basis, targeting consumers with dairy allergies, lactose intolerance, and health-conscious individuals. This product, formulated to provide similar functionality to dairy milk, is available through the Makuake crowdfunding platform from April 16 to June 15, 2025.

articles.title: Primark shopper 'cried' over £18 bedding that looks just like £120 designer version
articles.author: Chris Marzella
articles.summary: Primark has launched a new bedding set, a dupe of a Djerf Avenue design, priced at £18. The set includes a duvet cover and fitted sheet with a fruit print, made from a polycotton blend, with at least 50% from the Primark sustainable cotton program. The fitted sheet has blue stripes.

articles.title: We tried toilet roll from Aldi, Lidl and 6 more shops - the best was so soft
articles.author: Angela Patrone
articles.summary: The article compares toilet paper products from multiple supermarkets. M&S's super soft, triple-layered toilet paper is highlighted as a superior alternative to Andrex due to its softness and thickness. Asda's £1.38 toilet paper is presented as a viable budget-friendly option.

articles.title: Why this foundation stick is a must-have for your beauty routine
articles.author: Sarene Kloren
articles.summary: Essence is launching the 'essence foundation stick,' a versatile makeup product designed for a simplified routine. The foundation offers a creamy, buildable formula with a natural matte finish and is designed for on-the-go touch-ups.

articles.title: A New Kind Of Writer Is Born: How Gen AI Sparked Era Of Prompt Writer
articles.summary: The rise of Generative AI like GPT, Claude, and Gemini is creating a demand for "prompt writers." Companies are now hiring prompt engineers and AI content directors, demonstrating a shift in the job market and the emergence of new roles focused on guiding AI-driven content creation.

articles.title: Strolid Sponsors Groundbreaking TADHack Event to Expand vCon App Ecosystem
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Strolid, Inc. is sponsoring the TADHack event to expand the vCon App Store ecosystem, focused on developing applications leveraging the vCon standard for virtualized conversations. Developers will have access to vCon Creator tools, vCon Bucket hosting services, and templates to build vCon Apps, with a total prize money of US$5,000.

articles.title: Detroit-built Social Network MySALT AI Opens Waitlist for Beta Launch
articles.author: Tim Keenan
articles.summary: MySALT AI is launching a beta version of its platform, which empowers users with personal AIs. These AIs handle digital tasks and foster human-to-AI trust for safer social networking. Users can customize their AI and utilize features like cross-platform posting and AI-to-AI networking, with a premium marketplace for further enhancements.

articles.title: Amazon says it's constantly inviting users to try Alexa+ AI
articles.author: Ronil Thakkar
articles.summary: Amazon launched Alexa+, an AI-powered voice assistant, offering enhanced conversational abilities. While reports questioned its availability, Amazon confirmed that hundreds of thousands of users have access through an early access program, primarily on Echo Show devices. Alexa+ is free for Amazon Prime members and costs $19.99 per month for others.

articles.title: NVIDIA Announces DGX Cloud Lepton to Connect Developers to NVIDIA's Global Compute Ecosystem  May. 19, 2025 12:43
articles.summary: NVIDIA has launched NVIDIA DGX Cloud Lepton, an AI platform with a compute marketplace connecting developers with GPUs from a global network of cloud providers. This platform integrates with NVIDIA's software stack and offers benefits such as improved productivity, frictionless deployment, agility, and predictable performance. Developers can sign up for early access to NVIDIA DGX Cloud Lepton.

articles.title: Daisy continues nationwide expansion with the grand opening of its first Arizona franchisee
articles.author: Daisy
articles.summary: Daisy, a home and small business technology installation and services company, has opened a new branch in Scottsdale, Arizona. This new branch will offer custom technology solutions to homeowners and small businesses in the Scottsdale and Phoenix region.

articles.title: Santander, Barclays, Lloyds, NatWest, and HSBC customers see new ATM rule change
articles.author: James Rodger
articles.summary: Barclays, Halifax, Lloyds, NatWest, Ulster Bank, Bank of Scotland, Danske Bank, HSBC, Santander, TSB, Ulster Bank and Virgin Money are trialing a "super ATM". This ATM aims to streamline the cash deposit process for consumers, representing a new service or product update within the banking sector.

articles.title: Which Coffer Brands Are Best For A Refreshing Taste? 10 Picks For Everyone
articles.summary: The article highlights several coffee brands such as Nescafe, Bru, Toffee Coffee, Sunrise, Sleepy Owl, Bevzilla, and Rage Coffee, providing details on their unique features. Each brand is described in terms of flavor profiles, ingredients (like Arabica and Robusta beans), and packaging options, aimed at guiding consumers in their coffee selection.

articles.title: Nvidia pushes further into cloud with GPU marketplace
articles.author: Belle Lin
articles.summary: Nvidia has launched DGX Cloud Lepton, a service connecting AI developers with cloud providers for GPU access. This platform allows developers to choose from a marketplace of GPU cloud vendors to train and use their AI models, aiming to provide broader access to Nvidia's AI chips beyond major cloud providers and to aggregate GPUs across clouds.

articles.title: Starburst Unveils New AI Platform Capabilities to Accelerate Enterprise AI and Agents
articles.author: Starburst
articles.summary: Starburst has launched several new products and services, including Starburst AI Agent, Starburst AI Workflows, and Starburst Data Catalog. These offerings are designed to enhance data access, AI capabilities, and governance for enterprises using Starburst's platform. Additionally, Starburst Galaxy received enhancements such as Fully Managed Iceberg Pipelines and Automatic Query Routing to improve performance and simplify data readiness.

articles.title: Skin 'feeling soft and hydrated' after using sun cream that's £2.75 in Home Bargains
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Home Bargains is selling Biovene sun cream SPF 50, which offers UVA and UVB protection. The product is described as a lightweight, non-greasy, and water-resistant formula, with positive reviews online highlighting its scent and skin-nourishing properties.

articles.title: Niu Clocks 57% e-Scooter Sales Surge, But Tariffs Impact Margins
articles.author: Anusuya Lahiri
articles.summary: Niu Technologies integrated automotive-grade technologies, including millimeter-wave radar and AI Smart Ecosystem, into its e-scooters to enhance the user experience. The company's retail network also expanded with new stores opening during the quarter. Niu expects second-quarter revenues to increase by 40% to 50% Y/Y.

articles.title: Huawei nova 14 Series: Ultra, Pro & Standard Models Launched – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Huawei has launched the Nova 14 series, including the Nova 14 Ultra, Nova 14 Pro, and Nova 14. The Nova 14 Ultra features a 6.81-inch OLED display, advanced camera system, HarmonyOS 5, and a 5,500 mAh battery with 100W fast charging, starting at CNY 4,199. The Nova 14 and Nova 14 Pro offer a balance of performance and affordability with varying display and camera specifications, starting at CNY 2,699 and CNY 3,499 respectively, all powered by 5,500mAh batteries with 100W charging.

articles.title: OnePlus announces launch date of OnePlus 13s in India: Snapdragon 8 Elite, Plus Key and other features revealed
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: OnePlus has announced the launch of its new smartphone, the OnePlus 13s, scheduled for June 5, 2025, in India. The OnePlus 13s will feature the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite platform, a 4400mm² Cryo-Velocity Vapor Chamber for cooling, and will be available in Black Velvet, Pink Satin, and Green Silk, with the latter exclusive to India. The phone includes a customizable "Plus Key" for shortcuts and enhanced connectivity features.

articles.title: 2026 Toyota RAV4: Rugged exterior teased just ahead of launch
articles.author: Derek Fung
articles.summary: Toyota is launching the sixth-generation Toyota RAV4. The automaker has provided extra photos showing parts of the all-new mid-size SUV's exterior.

articles.title: Samsung DeX vs Android desktop mode
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Google may launch a desktop experience for Android with the release of Android 17. This launch introduces a new feature or service to the Android ecosystem.

articles.title: Does the slim new Galaxy S25 give Samsung an Edge over Apple? Yes and no
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim flagship phone with a 6.7-inch 2K LTPO AMOLED display, Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, and 12GB RAM. This new addition to the S25 series boasts a slim design and light weight, aiming to redefine its category and provides flagship specifications.

articles.title: Leaked Code Reveals Google's Plan to Turn Your Phone into a Desktop
articles.author: Afaq Wajdan Malik
articles.summary: Google is developing 'Android Desktop Mode,' a new feature that will allow users to connect their smartphones to external displays and use them like a regular PC. The feature is expected to include resizable app windows, familiar navigation tools, and an app management system. It is likely to debut with Android 17, starting with the next generation of Google Pixel devices.

articles.title: PR firm celebrates eight years of digital news innovation
articles.author: Olivia Sinclair
articles.summary: Magic PR is celebrating the eighth anniversary of its news platform, The News Front, which has evolved into a comprehensive digital platform with over 43 industry categories. The platform uses AI-driven services that transform press releases into podcasts distributed across 25 different platforms, as well as creates Breaking News videos for YouTube.

articles.title: 实测Manus和Lovart，谁才是Agent新王？
articles.summary: Lovart, a vertical AI agent, is introduced as a tool for creative design services, aiming to handle complete design tasks from brief to delivery.  It supports generating visuals, automated layout, and material extensions, offering a comprehensive design workflow different from general AI tools like Manus, which focuses on broader task management. Lovart streamlines the design process by handling everything from demand gathering to generating ready-to-use graphics.

articles.title: Next's 'perfect' £25 summer dress shoppers 'can't wait to wear on holiday'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next is launching the Khaki Green Ruffle Midi Slip Summer Dress retailing at £25. The dress is available in sizes six to 26 and also comes in a chic black and pink mix design. Similar dresses are offered by H&M, New Look and River Island.

articles.title: 'Perfect' £25 Next dress shoppers 'can't wait to wear on holiday'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Next is offering the Khaki Green Ruffle Midi Slip Summer Dress, retailing at £25 in sizes six to 26. The dress features a lightweight fabric with asymmetric ruffle detailing, thin adjustable straps and an all-over floral print. The new summer dress has received generally positive feedback from customers, although some have noted issues with fit and quality.

articles.title: GIGABYTE EVENT Unveils Comprehensive AI Solutions with "LEADING EDGE" at COMPUTEX 2025
articles.author: GIGABYTE
articles.summary: GIGABYTE unveiled a series of brand-new AI solutions under the theme "LEADING EDGE." These solutions include AI devices, AI software, and advanced AI-enhanced performance technology. GIGABYTE reaffirms its commitment to delivering accessible AI at the edge.

articles.title: Boden's £66 'flattering' summer dress that 'won't crease' is reduced to £46
articles.author: Lucy Addicott
articles.summary: Boden has unveiled the Nina Smocked T-shirt Dress as part of its spring sale with a 30% discount, bringing the price down to £46.60. The dress, available in multiple sizes and lengths, is made from 100% cotton and designed for warm weather. The article also mentions Boden's Casual Flat Sandals and Cross Strap Sliders, along with dresses from White Stuff and Nobody's Child.

articles.title: Barclays, Halifax, Lloyds, NatWest, and RSB customers see new ATM rule change
articles.author: James Rodger
articles.summary: Barclays, Halifax, Lloyds, NatWest, RBS, Ulster Bank, and Bank of Scotland are trialing 'super ATMs'. These ATMs offer enhanced functionalities like cross-bank cash deposits, withdrawals for select UK bank customers, balance inquiries, and PIN changes, aiming to streamline cash handling for consumers and small businesses.

articles.title: Lidl's new Olaplex dupes are £50 cheaper & ‘transform hair in 4 washes' as shoppers say dry locks are now ‘soft & shiny'
articles.author: Josie O'Brien
articles.summary: Lidl introduced Bond Repair No 1 shampoo and No 2 conditioner as affordable alternatives to Olaplex. Content creator Samantha Roobottom claims that Lidl's haircare dupes transformed her dry hair in just four washes, offering a cheaper option compared to Olaplex.

articles.title: Lidl's new Olaplex dupes are £50 cheaper & ‘transform hair in 4 washes' as shoppers say dry locks are now ‘soft & shiny'
articles.author: Josie O'Brien
articles.summary: Lidl introduced its Bond Repair No 1 shampoo and No 2 conditioner, priced at £3.29 each, as affordable alternatives to Olaplex products. A content creator found that the Lidl products transformed her dry hair in just four washes, making it softer and more manageable. These Lidl dupes offer a significant cost saving compared to Olaplex originals.

articles.title: Lidl's new Olaplex dupes are £50 cheaper & ‘transform hair in 4 washes' as shoppers say dry locks are now ‘soft & shiny'
articles.author: Josie O'Brien
articles.summary: Lidl has introduced Bond Repair No 1 shampoo and No 2 conditioner as affordable dupes for Olaplex products. A content creator reported significant improvements in hair condition after using the Lidl products for just four washes. The Lidl dupes cost £6.58 compared to £56 for the Olaplex originals.

articles.title: It's the taste of summer, I think it improves everything! Aldi's new hot honey range
articles.author: Senior Reporter
articles.summary: Aldi is launching several new hot honey products, including Hot Honey & 'Nduja Sausages, Hot Honey & Feta Orzo Salad, Hot Honey Olives with Cheese Pearls, Specially Selected Italian Pinsa Pizza with Nduja, Salami & Hot Honey, and Sriracha Hot Honey Topped Houmous. They are also launching Bramwells Hot Honey, Hot Honey Burnt Ends, Pulled Pork, and Chicken Thigh Bites. This expansion aims to tap into summer eating habits.

articles.title: Fintech experts converge as Dyna.Ai launches operations in Nigeria
articles.author: Nairametrics
articles.summary: Dyna.Ai, an AI-as-a-Service provider, launched its operations in Nigeria on May 15, 2025. The launch event, Nigeria Dyna Day, featured the introduction of Dyna.Ai's AI-powered products and solutions to Nigeria's financial sector.

articles.title: Dance with a K-pop star? Wrestle a luchador? Airbnb to offer 22,000 experiences
articles.author: Airbnb PRESS RELEASE/TNS
articles.summary: Airbnb launched Airbnb Services, a new service offering including categories such as hair styling, cooking, massage, and photography. This launch expands Airbnb's services beyond lodging and features a redesigned app to integrate all offerings.

articles.title: "Anyone could have at least one artificial intelligence (AI) supercomputer for Christmas." Nvidia CE..
articles.author: Park Seung-Joo
articles.summary: Nvidia introduced the DGX Spark, an ultra-small AI supercomputer, and RTX 5060 AI chip-equipped laptops. The DGX Spark offers high computational performance and is designed for individuals and small businesses, while the RTX 5060 laptops enable AI use without internet connectivity. Furthermore, Qualcomm unveiled its Snapdragon X Elite chipset for AI PCs, highlighting advancements in AI-integrated computing solutions.

articles.title: AdTech platform scores 30,000 downloads
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: Lohli, an AdTech platform, has launched publicly. The platform is designed to help users earn money by watching ads and reviewing products. Lohli recorded 30,000 downloads within 48 hours of its launch.

articles.title: UACs new swan water hits market
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: UAC Foods' Swan Natural Spring Water now features refreshed packaging. The product proudly carries the endorsement seal of the Nigerian Medical Association (NMA).

articles.title: Nvidia Launches Lepton Platform to Streamline AI Chip Marketplace-钛媒体官方网站
articles.summary: Nvidia has launched Lepton, a new software platform that creates a centralized marketplace connecting cloud providers offering Nvidia GPUs with software developers needing computing power for AI model training. This aims to streamline GPU sourcing and expand access to Nvidia's developer community. Several companies like CoreWeave and Nebius Group have joined the Lepton marketplace.

articles.title: Want some baked goods or Korean BBQ? Try these new North Jersey options
articles.author: Daniel Munoz
articles.summary: Optimum launched an interactive retail store in River Edge on April 15, offering services like registration, mobile device shopping, bill payment, and customer assistance. Li's Hot Pot & BBQ, an all-you-can-eat East Asian cuisine restaurant, opened in Little Falls. Tatte Bakery, offering Mediterranean-inspired baked goods, opened a location in Ridgewood on May 5.

articles.title: Ed Sheeran teams up with Ember to launch Xtra Tingly Biltong
articles.author: Niamh Leonard-Bedwell
articles.summary: Tingly Ted's, in collaboration with Ember, has launched Xtra Tingly Biltong, a spicy beef snack marinated in Tingly Ted's Xtra Tingly Sauce, and available in Sainsbury's with a Nectar card promotion. Additionally, Tingly Ted's launched XXXtra Tingly sauce in March to appeal to Gen Z consumers.

articles.title: For IT firm Stefanini, future lies in effective use of technology
articles.summary: Stefanini collaborated with a perfume company, leveraging AI to relaunch a nostalgic fragrance, resulting in a 42% performance increase within 10 days. Stefanini currently offers over 50 proprietary software solutions, combining technology and service efficiently.

articles.title: 7UP® LAUNCHES SUPER DUPER REFRESHER: ITS DYNAMIC GLOBAL PLATFORM TO OWN FUNCTIONAL REFRESHMENT
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: 7UP, a PepsiCo trademark, is launching a new global platform called 'Super Duper Refresher,' focusing on the fusion of flavor, fizz, and cold temperature. The platform includes new product launches, creative campaigns, and real-world experiences tailored to local markets like India, Pakistan, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia, with culturally relevant narratives.

articles.title: These 5 Early Phones Helped Make Android What It Is Today
articles.author: Gaurav Shukla
articles.summary: T-Mobile G1, also known as HTC Dream and manufactured by HTC, was the first commercially available Android phone launched on September 23, 2008. Featuring a slider form factor with a landscape AZERTY keyboard and a 3.5-inch HVGA LCD touchscreen display, it sold over a million units in less than a year and showcased Android's potential for customization and flexibility.

articles.title: 7UP® LAUNCHES SUPER DUPER REFRESHER: ITS DYNAMIC GLOBAL PLATFORM TO OWN FUNCTIONAL REFRESHMENT
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: 7UP launched "Super Duper Refresher," a global platform designed to deliver ultimate refreshment. The launch includes product innovations like 7UP Extra Fizz, 7UP Mint Lemonade, and 7UP Pink Lemonade, each tailored to specific markets, such as Egypt, Pakistan, and the UK, respectively, to cater to evolving consumer preferences. The company is also introducing a new music logo (MOGO).

articles.title: Pangdonglai Debuts in Australia with Umall Exclusivity
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: Umall, an Australian e-commerce platform, has launched selected products from the Chinese retail brand Pangdonglai exclusively in Australia. This marks Pangdonglai's first entry into the international market, offering its best-selling snacks, beverages, and daily essentials to Umall's customer base via same-day/next-day delivery.

articles.title: Airtel Spam Alert Service Built To Safeguard Subscribers Against Acams — CEO
articles.author: Leadership News
articles.summary: Airtel Nigeria has launched the Airtel Spam Alert Service, an AI-powered solution designed to protect subscribers from fraudulent SMS by detecting and blocking suspicious messages.  Following successful deployment in Nigeria, the service has expanded to Tanzania and Kenya and will cover Airtel's entire African operations, automatically activating for all Airtel customers. This service sets a new benchmark for mobile security standards in the region.

articles.title: [브레이크뉴스] 광주신세계, 프리미엄 초슬림 ‘갤럭시S25 엣지' 선봬
articles.author: 이학수기자
articles.summary: Gwangju Shinsegae is introducing the premium ultra-slim design 'Galaxy S25 Edge'. The Galaxy S25 Edge features a slim design with a thickness of 5.8mm, a titanium frame, durable glass, and a 200 million pixel high-resolution rear camera. It's available at the Samsung Store on the 8th floor of the Gwangju Shinsegae main building and the pop-up store on the 1st floor, with pre-orders available until the 20th.

articles.title: No, the iPhone 17 Air didn't inspire the Galaxy S25 Edge: Samsung clarifies
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy S25 Edge, a slim smartphone featuring flagship specifications such as a Titanium alloy frame, Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, Galaxy AI, and a redesigned 200-megapixel camera. The phone, developed since at least August 2023, aims to offer Galaxy S25 Ultra-like features in a leaner package, measuring 5.8mm and weighing 163 grams.

articles.title: Born from Love, Built for Innovation: PetSnowy Elevates Everyday Pet Care
articles.author: Pet Snowy
articles.summary: PetSnowy has launched the SNOW+ Self-Cleaning Litter Box, featuring TiO2 deodorization, UV light sterilization, and robert odor neutralization technology.  It automatically seals waste for disposal and can be fully disassembled for cleaning. PetSnowy also offers a smart dryer box and an air purifier as part of its product line.

articles.title: Nvidia software aims to create marketplace for AI computing power
articles.author: Stephen Nellis
articles.summary: Nvidia has launched Lepton, a new software platform designed to create a marketplace for cloud-based AI chips. This platform allows cloud computing companies to sell GPU capacity and helps developers find available chips more seamlessly. Lepton aims to facilitate access to Nvidia's developer ecosystem for both global and new cloud providers.

articles.title: [TEST] Remember the Viral Billboard? Here's How It Inspired M'sians to #TalkNotType Their Web Searches!
articles.author: Hanif Rozani
articles.summary: Samsung introduced Gemini Live, an AI-powered feature on the Galaxy S25 series, allowing users to interact via voice.  Customers who purchase the Galaxy S25 series can get six months of Gemini Advanced for free.  Samsung promoted the feature at the Samsung AI TalkSpot event in Kuala Lumpur from May 21-27, 2025.

articles.title: [TEST] Speak Your Questions: M'sians Can Now #TalkNotType Their Searches Better With Samsung's Gemini Live AI
articles.author: Hanif Rozani
articles.summary: Samsung is introducing Gemini Live, a new AI-powered feature on the Galaxy S25 series, allowing users to get voice-powered answers and help with various tasks. Customers who purchase a Galaxy S25 series phone will receive 6 months of Gemini Advanced for free, with an activation event scheduled at The Starhill, Kuala Lumpur from May 21-27, 2025.

articles.title: [TEST] From Viral Billboards to Voice AI: M'sians Can Now #TalkNotType Their Searches Better With Samsung's Gemini Live!
articles.author: Hanif Rozani
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced Gemini Live, an AI-powered feature available on the Galaxy S25 series, enabling users to interact with their phones via voice commands for tasks such as answering questions, brainstorming ideas, and language practice. Customers who purchase the Galaxy S25 series will receive a free 6-month trial of Gemini Advanced.

articles.title: Vertiv Accelerates AI Infrastructure Evolution in Alignment with NVIDIA 800 VDC Power Architecture Announcement
articles.author: Vertiv Holdings Co
articles.summary: Vertiv aligns with NVIDIA's AI roadmap to develop 800 VDC power architectures for AI data centers. Vertiv's 800 VDC power portfolio is scheduled for release in the second half of 2026, prior to the NVIDIA Kyber and NVIDIA Rubin Ultra platform launches, indicating a new product launch.

articles.title: NVIDIA Announces DGX Cloud Lepton to Connect Developers to NVIDIA's Global Compute Ecosystem
articles.author: NVIDIA
articles.summary: NVIDIA has launched NVIDIA DGX Cloud Lepton, an AI platform with a compute marketplace, connecting developers with tens of thousands of GPUs via a global network of cloud providers. Cloud partners like CoreWeave, Crusoe, Firmus, Foxconn, GMI Cloud, Lambda, Nebius, Nscale, Softbank Corp., and Yotta Data Services will offer NVIDIA Blackwell GPUs on the DGX Cloud Lepton marketplace. Developers can access GPU compute capacity for on-demand and long-term computing.

articles.title: OpenAI Brings GPT-4.1 And GPT-4.1 Mini For Paid And Free Users: All Details
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: OpenAI is launching GPT 4.1, a new iteration of its GPT model. This version will be available to both paid and free users, with varying limits and features based on subscription.

articles.title: NASDOTCtoLunchNew Products,UnlockInvestment inCritical Sectors
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: NASD OTC Exchange Plc is preparing to launch innovative products aimed at unlocking investment opportunities within the real estate and cooperative societies sectors.

articles.title: Dyna.Ai Launches Operations in Nigeria
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Dyna.Ai, a global AIaaS provider, launched its operations in Nigeria. The launch included the introduction and orientation of its AI-as-a-Service offering.

articles.title: Kingston FURY releases high performance PCIe 5.0 NVMe SSD
articles.author: Ajith Athrady
articles.summary: Kingston introduced the Kingston FURY Renegade G5, a new SSD. This product is targeted towards gamers, content creators, and workstation users.

articles.title: LTO docs hint at a new variant of the BMW 7-Series
articles.summary: BMW Philippines is expected to launch a new variant of the 7-Series, the 750e xDrive, a plug-in hybrid model. This model features a turbocharged 3.0-liter inline-six engine mated to an electric motor and a 22.1kWh battery, producing a combined output of 483hp and 700Nm with an electric-only range of 83-87 kilometers.

articles.title: Aldi Australia finally brings back fan favourite snack: 'This is the most excited I've ever been'
articles.author: ELISE WILSON
articles.summary: Aldi has relaunched its popular 'naanwich,' a butter chicken sandwich, priced at $4.99 for a two-pack. The product, first introduced in 2019, features creamy butter chicken served between naan bread and can be heated in the microwave. The snack has been positively received, prompting a viral reaction on social media.

articles.title: 2025 Chery C5: Renamed Chinese SUV starts from $29,990 drive-away
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: The company is launching the Jaecoo brand in the market. Vehicles will be sold alongside Omoda brand models, with Omoda's launch planned for the second half of 2025.

articles.title: 28 Home Items Amazon Customers Are Loving May 2025
articles.author: Ashley Schumacher
articles.summary: The article highlights a selection of trending home products on Amazon, including items like Keurig K-Mini coffee maker, Zevo flying-insect trap, Poo-Pourri toilet spray, microfiber sheets, and many other new trending home products. These products are currently popular among Amazon customers.

articles.title: Streem debuts AI suite to streamline media workflows
articles.author: Tom Gosby
articles.summary: Streem has launched Streem AI, a new suite of artificial intelligence-driven tools integrated into its existing media intelligence platform, following a strategic collaboration with Google Cloud in late 2024. Streem AI includes features like intuitive search capabilities, an AI-powered assistant, and enhanced analytics and is immediately available to Streem's clients in Australia and New Zealand.

articles.title: Samsung Launches Global Campaign Showcasing Vision AI Features
articles.author: Bia Staff
articles.summary: Samsung has launched a global campaign promoting Samsung Vision AI, a new suite of smart TV features. These AI-powered innovations enhance user experience through features like real-time information access, content translation, AI upscaling, and gesture control when paired with a Galaxy Watch. The campaign aims to highlight the user-centric approach of the technology.

articles.title: SamMobile – Archyde: Latest World News, Economy, Entertainment, Health, Technology & Sports Updates
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced Game Booster Plus, a tool to enhance gaming performance on Galaxy devices running Android 15 and One UI 7.0. The new product offers features like controller remapping, GPU optimization, Vulkan API optimization, and texture filtering to customize and improve the mobile gaming experience.

articles.title: Toyota shows off new-look Corolla Cross in Europe
articles.author: Manila Bulletin
articles.summary: Toyota unveiled an updated version of the Corolla Cross. The updated version showcases styling and performance enhancements. These enhancements are aimed at maintaining competitiveness in its segment.

articles.title: I tried a robot vacuum in my 2-bed flat to see if it's worth ditching my traditional model for
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Ultenic introduced the D10 robot vacuum, retailing at £179.99 (currently on sale for £152.99) on Amazon. The setup process involves attaching the side brush, topping up the mop container, connecting to Wi-Fi, and creating an online account. The Ultenic D10 creates a map of the user's home to efficiently clean.

articles.title: Bridging the gap: Making tech more accessible for the rest of government
articles.summary: Open Government Products (OGP) has implemented products like ParkingSG, Careers@Gov 2.0, and ScamShield. OGP is also working on Pair, an AI-driven chatbot. These products were developed during annual hackathons in response to problems faced by Singaporeans.

articles.title: ProSat Networks Expands Professional Starlink Installation Services in New Mexico
articles.author: info@kalkinemedia.com
articles.summary: ProSat Networks offers Starlink installation services in New Mexico. The services are accessible via 1-844-799-0258.

articles.title: GS Shop will openly recruit companies to participate in the Home Shopping Sales Broadcasting Support..
articles.author: Kim Hyeon-Jung
org: Korea Small and Medium Venture Business Distribution Service
articles.summary: GS Shop is initiating open recruitment for its 'Home Shopping Sales Broadcasting Support Project,' aimed at helping small and medium-sized companies expand their distribution. Selected companies will receive free sales broadcasting organization and up to 7 million won in insert video production cost support. The recruitment aims to provide more SMEs and small business owners nationwide with opportunities for market access.

articles.title: 롯데칠성, '칠성사이다 제로 오렌지' 출시
articles.author: 최승근
articles.summary: Lotte Chilsung Beverage is launching a new product, 'Chilsung Cider Zero Orange', a zero-sugar soda with orange flavor. It will be available first on the company's online mall 'Chilsung Mall' from July 19th, with nationwide sales starting July 26th and marketing activities planned in mid-June.

articles.title: 30 Things Under $25 That Solve Gross Problems
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: I Dew Care launched "Tap Secret" mattifying powder shampoo, a nonaerosol, benzene-free product designed to refresh hair by absorbing oil and adding volume. Litter Genie offers waste disposal system for cat owners. Oh Yuk provides jetted tub cleaner which breaks down and removes yuck from inside jetted bathtub in just 15 minutes.

articles.title: The All-New MG ZS: The Ultimate Driving Companion
articles.author: bizbahrain
articles.summary: MG is launching the 2025 model of its MG ZS SUV. The new model boasts a dynamic design, cutting-edge technology, and robust safety features. It is available at Zayani Motors, the exclusive distributor of MG in the Kingdom.

articles.title: Dyna.Ai Launches Operations in Nigeria
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: Dyna.Ai, an AI-as-a-Service company, launched its operations in Nigeria. The launch event, 'Nigeria Dyna Day,' introduced Dyna.Ai's suite of AI-powered products.

articles.title: Izu Burger officially joins Time Out Market Dubai
articles.author: Time Out Dubai
articles.summary: Izu Ani, creator of GAIA and other celebrated restaurants, is launching Izu Burger at Time Out Market Dubai on May 22. Izu Burger is a new, saucy burger offering.

articles.title: Nvidia plans to sell tech to speed AI chip communication
articles.author: Hong Kong Standard
articles.summary: Nvidia plans to sell a technology to others.

articles.title: ONVO L90 Sets New Benchmark for Spacious Electric SUVs
articles.author: The Arabian Post
articles.summary: NIO's sub-brand ONVO unveiled its flagship SUV, the L90, at Auto Shanghai 2025. The L90, a full-size, six-seat SUV, is built on NIO's NT3.0 platform and features a 900V high-voltage architecture.

articles.title: Aldi Australia finally brings back fan favourite snack: 'This is the most excited I've ever ...
articles.author: The Daily Mail
articles.summary: Aldi has relaunched its popular butter chicken 'naanwich'. This food product was initially released in 2019 and became a customer favorite.

articles.title: Onward and upward for Nvidia
articles.author: Eweekly
articles.summary: Huang announced volume production of an upgraded RTX Pro Server system. The new system offers 4x better performance than H100 when running DeepSeek and 1.7x better performance with Llama models.

articles.title: Motorola Expands Its 2025 Razr Lineup With New Phones, AI Partnerships
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Motorola's Razr 60 Ultra features new colors and materials. The Razr range reflects Motorola's focus on AI-driven functionality.

articles.title: DJI unveils Mavic 4 Pro with Hasselblad lens
articles.author: Shenzhen Daily
articles.summary: DJI released the DJI Mavic 4 Pro, its new flagship drone, last week. The drone features a triple-lens camera system including a 100-megapixel Hasselblad main lens designed for versatility in capturing various shots, from wide-angle landscapes to close-ups.

articles.title: Bill payers urged to pick up Sky broadband deals as price hike date revealed
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Sky reduced prices on its broadband packages for new customers, but this pricing change is set to end.

articles.title: JTI reports ‘phenomenal' growth for Nordic Spirit nicotine pouches in Philippines
articles.author: Manila Bulletin
articles.summary: JTI Philippines introduced Nordic Spirit, an oral nicotine product, in the Philippines in May 2023. The company views the Philippines as a high-growth market and anticipates Nordic Spirit will offer adult Filipino nicotine consumers a pleasurable alternative to smoking.

articles.title: Is your AI app pissing off users or going off-script? Raindrop emerges with AI-native observability ...
articles.author: Venture Beat
articles.summary: Raindrop is expanding its product line with an AI-first approach, aiming for the next generation of software observability.

articles.title: Marc Jacobs fans 'ditch' Daisy perfume for 'more magical' version that's now half price
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: A company has released a softer and more magical rendition of its classic Daisy EDP.

articles.title: YETI is gearing up for summer with 2 new colors — and you can be ...
articles.author: Lehigh Valley
articles.summary: YETI is launching a brand new color drop of its products. The new color options are designed to evoke a summer aesthetic.

articles.title: I'm a photographer, and this Leica-style smartphone is the closest thing I've seen to a ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Nubia designed the Z70S Ultra Retro Kit to replace compact cameras. The kit has the appropriate aesthetics for this purpose, suggesting its introduction to the market.

articles.title: Data Patterns expects production orders for Brahmos Seekers after successful flight tests
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Data Patterns' products power ground-based and mobile-based launches.

articles.title: 2026 LEXUS RZ ADDS MORE POWER AND PERFORMANCE
articles.author: Lexus
articles.summary: Lexus unveiled the enhanced 2026 RZ, a battery electric luxury SUV. The updated RZ features revisions, including increased power and greater range. The RZ 550e F SPORT AWD includes a Lexus-first virtual manual gear shift system.
